importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The outage occurred on Monday, October 20, 2025, marking a significant event in cloud infrastructure reliability and highlighting vulnerabilities in global digital dependencies.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The outage began at 07:11 GMT and was resolved by 10:11 GMT, indicating a 3-hour window of disruption that underscored the fragility of internet-dependent services.

keyTakeAways: The AWS outage originated from a technical error during a software update to DynamoDB's API, affecting the Domain Name System (DNS) and preventing apps from connecting to critical databases.
Over 113 AWS services were impacted, including major platforms like Snapchat, Pinterest, WhatsApp, Zoom, Roblox, Fortnite, Starbucks, Duolingo, and financial apps like Venmo and Coinbase.
The root cause was not a cyberattack but human error in a technical update, a common cause of cloud outages.
Cloud services like AWS are foundational to modern digital life, and their failure cascades across industries — from banking and gaming to smart home devices and media.
Despite the disruption, AWS quickly restored services and acknowledged the issue, emphasizing their dominance in the cloud market (30% share) and resilience in the face of such incidents.

summaryOfNewsArticle: A major outage at Amazon Web Services (AWS) on October 20, 2025, began at 07:11 GMT due to a technical error in a software update to DynamoDB’s API, which disrupted the Domain Name System (DNS) and caused apps to fail in connecting to critical servers. The failure cascaded to over 113 AWS services, affecting major platforms including Snapchat, WhatsApp, Roblox, Fortnite, Venmo, Duolingo, and banks like Coinbase. The root cause was identified as human error, not a cyberattack, and AWS restored services by 10:11 GMT, though some users faced delays. The incident highlighted how deeply reliant modern digital services — from finance and gaming to smart home devices and media — are on cloud infrastructure, reinforcing AWS’s central role in global internet operations.
title: What caused Amazon’s AWS outage, and why did so many major apps go offline?
